snippet: Twice Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova said on Friday she would do everything she could to return to tennis after suffering a hand injury in a knife attack that will keep her out of the sport for at least six months....
lead_paragraph: Twice Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova said on Friday she would do everything she could to return to tennis after suffering a hand injury in a knife attack that will keep her out of the sport for at least six months.

headline.main: Kvitova Determined to Play Again After Knife Attack
headline.print_headline: Kvitova Determined to Play Again After Knife Attack
